description: Try our easy to follow Garlic Bread Beef Sliders recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Garlic Bread Beef Sliders Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To assemble the sliders, divide each garlic bread loaf into four portions. Split each portion and top bottom half with a teaspoon of sweet chilli sauce, some spinach leaves, the patty and a teaspoon of tomato sauce. Top with remaining half and serve.
